name: EMARC
tagline: A Hybrid Electromagnetic Rail & Coil Accelerator
body:
# EMARC > Hybrid Electromagnetic Rail & Coil Accelerator

## Abstract EMARC is a project that working on the combination of rail and coil gun, which means we want to use the coil accelerator as the pre-accelerator of the rail gun.
## Theory These are the external links to introduce the principle of electromagnetic coil and rail accelerator: > [Coil Accelerator/ Gun](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coilgun) > [Rail Accelerator/ Gun](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Railgun)

## EMARC Current Progress #### Photos of our Coil Accelerator ![Theory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JonathanZhuMD/EMARC/master/9.%20Photos/Coil%20Accelerator/PIC-02-00.png) Theory ![Photo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JonathanZhuMD/EMARC/master/9.%20Photos/Coil%20Accelerator/PIC-02-01.png) ![Photo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JonathanZhuMD/EMARC/master/9.%20Photos/Coil%20Accelerator/PIC-02-02.png) Parts ![Photo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JonathanZhuMD/EMARC/master/9.%20Photos/Coil%20Accelerator/PIC-02-04.png) Final Product
#### Photos of our Rail Accelerator ![Photo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JonathanZhuMD/EMARC/master/9.%20Photos/Rail%20Accelerator/IMG_0559.JPG) ![Photo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JonathanZhuMD/EMARC/master/9.%20Photos/Rail%20Accelerator/IMG_0563.JPG) Final Product
#### Combination ![Photo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JonathanZhuMD/EMARC/master/9.%20Photos/Rail%20Accelerator/IMG_0569.JPG) Combination
